moves.1... d5 2. c4 e6 3. Nc3 c6: this is not a bad move.
moves.4. Nf3 f5: !? ahhh... the stonewall, if i know the stonewall, black will attack my king.
moves.5. g3 Nf6 6. Bg2 Bd6 7. O-O O-O 8. b3: guarding c4 and bringing my DSB to a good post.
moves.8... Ne4 9. Bb2 Nxc3: ? black just wasted 2 moves for this???
moves.10. Bxc3 Nd7 11. Rc1 Nf6 12. Nd2 Bd7: im trying to get the e4 push.
moves.13. e3 Ne4 14. Bb2: i dont want to trade my DSB.
moves.14... Nxd2: if black had played Bb4 i was going to go Nb1!?
moves.22. f4: ?! this was tricky move, i thought that i would have an advantage if black played were i wanted him too.
moves.22... hxg3 23. fxg5 gxf2+ 24. Rxf2 Bxh2+: Dart! im down! that was not what i planed....
moves.25. Kf1 Rh4 26. exf5: i feel that this was best.
moves.26... Bg3 27. fxe6 Bxf2 28. Kxf2 Be8: now, this the most interesting part of the game!
moves.30... Bg6 31. Bf4 Kf8 32. Bd6+ Ke8 33. B: ! this was a excellent move! instead of e7? black can go Bf5!
